Interface ErrorMessageFactory

All Superinterfaces:
Implementation.ExtensionProvidable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultErrorMessageFactory, JsonErrorMessageFactory
public non-sealed interface ErrorMessageFactory extends Implementation.ExtensionProvidable
Generic interface for factory classes that provide MessageCreateData that should be sent for common errors that happen during an interaction execution, such as missing permissions or failing constraints.
See Also:
  • DefaultErrorMessageFactory
  • JsonErrorMessageFactory

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    ErrorMessageFactory.ErrorContext
    Holds the respective GenericInteractionCreateEvent and InteractionDefinition of an error.
